title: Perfect Stix - PAINT12-100 12" Wooden Paint Paddle Stirrer Sticks Length (Pack of 100)
description: The Perfect Stix PAINT12 paint paddle stick is 12" long, comes in a pack of 100 paddles, is made of biodegradable white birch wood that has been heat-treated to resist splintering, and is suitable for mixing or stirring paint and other liquids. It can be used for making hand-held signs and other crafts. Always follow paint-disposing procedures for sticks used with paints or other toxic substances. The paddle stick complies with standards for food safety.
